synonyms: Cancer of the Bone and Joint
summary: Bone cancer is a type of cancer that begins in any bone of the body. It can start in the cells that make up bone, or in cells that grow on or around bones, such as cartilage, fat, or muscle. Bone cancer can also start in other parts of the body and spread to the bone. This is called metastatic bone cancer or secondary bone cancer.
risk_factors: Inherited genetic syndromes (e.g., Li-Fraumeni syndrome, hereditary retinoblastoma)
